analysis.Summary: Vue component that displays a confirmation message when the userâ€™s wallet balance has been replenished, showing the received amount in WDT and providing a button to return to the wallet view.
analysis.Purpose: Serve as a UI block/modal in the wallet module to inform users about a successful deposit and allow them to navigate back to their wallet.

Components.CardBalanceReplenished: Main Vue component rendering the replenishment message, computed receive amount, and a close button.

Functions.name: receiveAmount
Functions.description: Calculates the displayed WDT amount by taking the raw depositInfo.amount, shifting decimal places, dividing by the TOKEN_EXCHANGE_RATE environment variable, and converting to string.

Functions.name: close
Functions.description: Emits a "close" event to inform the parent component to hide or remove this block.

analysis.Usage: Imported into a parent wallet view or modal. Used as <CardBalanceReplenished @close="handleClose"/> after a deposit flow to show the confirmation UI.
Notes: Localization is set up in global scope with translations loaded from wallet.json.
Environment variable TOKEN_EXCHANGE_RATE is required for correct currency conversion.
No scoped styles are defined in this file; styling relies on global utility classes.
